# init(audioMessageFile:)

**Initializer**

Creates a message attachment with an audio file.

## Declaration

```swift
init(audioMessageFile: INFile)
```

## Parameters

- **audioMessageFile**: An audio recording.
title: init(audioMessageFile:)
